statements: DELETE FROM supplier_performance WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM supplier_performance WHERE supplier_id = 101 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM supplier_performance WHERE supplier_name = 'XYZ Inc.' AND delivery_timeline < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DeliveryTimelines WHERE supplier_id = 200 AND delivery_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 55 AND supplier_name = 'XYZ Company';
DELETE FROM delivery_timelines WHERE delivery_status = 'delayed' AND supplier_id = 2;
DELETE FROM supplier_ratings WHERE rating_score < 2.5 AND rating_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM order_details WHERE quantity > 100 AND order_date < '2020-06-01';
